item.title: 后特朗普关税时代，铜贸易商寄望中国买家
item.description: 全球铜贸易商正在向中国买家提供货物，因为他们希望在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收 50%铜关税的最后期限之前卸下无法运抵美国的金属。【原文：Global copper traders are offering cargoes to Chinese buyers as they look to offload metal no longer able to reach the U.S. before President Donald Trump's 50% copper tariff deadline.】

item.title: 美国再次因螺旋虫害停止从墨西哥进口牛只
item.description: 由于破坏性牲畜害虫新世界螺虫在墨西哥蔓延，美国农业部再次停止向美国进口墨西哥牛。【原文：The U.S. Department of Agriculture has again halted imports of Mexican cattle into the United States due to the spread of the damaging livestock pest New World Screwworm in Mexico.】

item.title: 土耳其竞争委员会对谷歌处以 890 万美元罚款
item.description: 土耳其竞争管理局周四表示，已决定对谷歌处以约3.55亿里拉（约合887万美元）的行政罚款，原因是谷歌未能履行监管义务。【原文：The Turkish Competition Authority said on Thursday it had decided to impose an administrative fine of around 355 million lira ($8.87 million) on Google for failing to comply with regulatory obligations.】

item.title: 受关税影响，Conagra 预计全年利润下滑
item.description: 瘦肉精零食生产商康奈格拉品牌公司（Conagra Brands）周四预测年度利润低于预期，原因是预计美国关税将导致原料成本上升。【原文：Slim Jim snack maker Conagra Brands forecast annual profit below expectations on Thursday, anticipating higher costs of ingredients due to U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 私募市场金融科技公司 iCapital 在最新融资中估值超过 75 亿美元
item.description: 另类投资金融科技公司iCapital周四表示，在最新一轮外部融资中，该公司估值超过75亿美元，融资额超过8.2亿美元，凸显出投资者对扩大私人市场战略渠道的平台的兴趣与日俱增。【原文：Alternative investments fintech iCapital was valued at more than $7.5 billion in its latest external funding round, where it raised more than $820 million, the company said on Thursday, highlighting increasing investor interest in platforms that expand access to private-market strategies.】

item.title: 爱尔兰数据监管机构就存储在中国的数据对 TikTok 展开新调查
item.description: 爱尔兰强大的数据保护委员会周四表示，已对 TikTok 在中国服务器上存储欧洲用户数据一事展开新的调查。【原文：Ireland's powerful Data Protection Commission has opened a new inquiry into TikTok over the storage of European users' data on servers in China, the regulator said on Thursday.】

item.title: 空中客车公司任命拉尔斯-瓦格纳自 2026 年起担任其商用飞机业务首席执行官
item.description: 空中客车公司周四表示，拉尔斯-瓦格纳将从 2026 年 1 月 1 日起担任其商用飞机业务首席执行官。【原文：Airbus said on Thursday that Lars Wagner would become the CEO of its commercial aircraft business from January 1, 2026.】

item.title: 英国警方逮捕四名与 M&S、Co-op 和 Harrods 网络攻击事件有关的人员
item.description: 英国国家打击犯罪局称，警方对扰乱零售商玛莎百货、Co-op 和哈罗德百货运营的网络攻击进行了调查，并逮捕了四人。【原文：Four people have been arrested as part of a police investigation into cyberattacks that disrupted the operations of retailers Marks & Spencer , the Co-op and Harrods, Britain's National Crime Agency said.】

item.title: 早间竞购：4 万亿美元的英伟达掩盖了新关税
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: Polestar电动汽车季度销量大增，优惠吸引更多买家
item.description: 周四，Polestar 公布第二季度销量激增，原因是在充满挑战的宏观经济环境下，优惠和折扣有助于提高其欧洲本土市场的销量。【原文：Polestar reported a surge in second-quarter sales on Thursday, as offers and discounts helped boost sales in its home market of Europe amid a challenging macroeconomic environment.】

item.title: 贸易组织称，德国出口商 "不惜一切代价 "也不希望与美国达成贸易协议
item.description: BGA 贸易游说团体负责人德克-詹杜拉（Dirk Jandura）说，德国出口商不希望在与美国的贸易冲突中以任何代价达成协议。【原文：German exporters do not want a deal at any price in the trade conflict with the United States, said Dirk Jandura, head of the BGA trade lobby.】

item.title: 达美航空预计通过运力和成本控制提高利润
item.description: 达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）周四预测，本季度和全年的利润将好于预期，因为该公司预计，航空业根据需求调整运力的努力将提高定价能力。【原文：Delta Air Lines on Thursday forecast a better-than-expected profit for the current quarter and full year as it expects the industry's efforts to align capacity with demand to improve pricing power.】

item.title: MP Materials 与国防部合作促进美国稀土磁铁供应，股价飙升
item.description: MP Materials 公司周四表示，该公司已与美国国防部建立了公私合作伙伴关系，以建立国内稀土磁体供应链，减少对外依赖，该公司股价在盘前交易中上涨了 30%。【原文：MP Materials said on Thursday it has entered into a public-private partnership with the U.S. Department of Defense to build-out domestic rare earth magnet supply chain and reduce foreign dependency, sending shares up 30% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 美国银行利润将因交易和投行业务走强而攀升
item.description: 受交易活跃和投资银行业务小幅反弹的推动，预计下周美国各大银行将公布更强劲的利润报告。【原文：Major U.S. banks are expected to report stronger profits next week, driven by buoyant trading and a modest rebound in investment banking.】

item.title: 印度 TCS 第一季度营收不及预期
item.description: 印度塔塔咨询服务公司（Tata Consultancy Services）周四公布的第一季度营收低于预期，原因是在关税相关不确定性的影响下，客户对可自由支配的支出仍持谨慎态度。【原文：India's Tata Consultancy Services reported lower-than-expected first-quarter revenue on Thursday as clients remained cautious about discretionary spending amid tariff-related uncertainty.】

item.title: 特朗普关税打击后巴西市场面临考验
item.description: 周四，巴西金融市场似乎将迎来一个崎岖的开端，交易商们仍在试图理解美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对拉美最大经济体征收50%而非之前所说的10%关税这一令人震惊的举动。【原文：Brazil's financial markets looked set for a bumpy start on Thursday, with traders still trying to grasp U.S. President Donald Trump's shock move to slap 50% tariffs on Latin America's largest economy rather than the 10% previously indicated.】

item.title: 马斯克表示，Grok AI 下周将应用于特斯拉汽车
item.description: 特斯拉电动汽车公司首席执行官埃隆-马斯克周四在 X 网站上发表文章称，"最迟 "下周，特斯拉汽车就能使用 Grok AI。【原文：Grok AI will be available in Tesla vehicles next week "at the latest", the EV maker's CEO, Elon Musk, said in a post on X on Thursday.】

item.title: 特斯拉将于 11 月召开年度股东大会
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）领导的特斯拉汽车公司周四表示，将于 11 月 6 日召开年度股东大会。【原文：Tesla will hold its annual shareholder meeting on November 6, the Elon Musk-led automaker said on Thursday.】

item.title: 华尔街期货在英伟达飙升 4 万亿美元后有所回落；数据、贸易谈判成为焦点
item.description: 在市场受到英伟达（Nvidia）转瞬即逝的 4 万亿美元里程碑支撑一天之后，美国股指期货周四有所回落，投资者将注意力转移到即将公布的经济数据和关键的贸易谈判上。【原文：U.S. stock index futures eased on Thursday, a day after markets were supported by Nvidia's fleeting $4 trillion milestone, while investors shifted their focus to upcoming economic data and pivotal trade talks.】

item.title: 谁是 WPP 新任首席执行官辛迪-罗斯？
item.description: 英国 WPP 公司周四任命董事会成员辛迪-罗斯（Cindy Rose）为该广告集团的新任首席执行官，这位微软公司的资深高管将在 9 月 1 日接替马克-雷德（Mark Read）之后，领导集团实现复苏。【原文：Britain's WPP named board member Cindy Rose as the advertising group's new chief executive on Thursday, tasking the senior Microsoft executive with leading its recovery after she succeeds Mark Read on September 1.】

item.title: 美国农业部将停止在许多农业项目中考虑种族和性别因素
item.description: 美国农业部周四表示，在许多农业贷款、商品和保护计划中，将不再考虑农民的种族或性别，从而结束了该机构为解决歧视历史问题所做的长期努力。【原文：The U.S. Department of Agriculture said on Thursday it would no longer consider a farmer's race or sex in many of its farm loan, commodity and conservation programs, ending a longstanding effort by the agency to address its history of discrimination.】

item.title: CVC 以超过 10 亿美元的估值投资新加坡科技公司 Airalo
item.description: 周四，欧洲私募股权公司 CVC 领投了新加坡旅游技术专业公司 Airalo 的 2.2 亿美元融资，该公司估值超过 10 亿美元。【原文：European private equity firm CVC led a $220-million funding round in Singaporean travel technology specialist Airalo, valuing the business at more than $1 billion, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧盟帮助企业遵守人工智能规则的实践准则将关注版权和安全问题
item.description: 欧盟委员会周四表示，一项旨在帮助数千家公司遵守欧盟具有里程碑意义的人工智能规则的行为准则，将重点关注透明度、版权、安全和保障。【原文：A code of practice designed to help thousands of companies comply with the European Union's landmark artificial intelligence rules will focus on transparency, copyright, safety and security, the European Commission said on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普称风能和太阳能对电网不利。得克萨斯州的情况表明并非如此
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普声称，太阳能和风能的迅速普及使美国的电力供应变得不稳定且昂贵，这为他要求终止对可再生能源的大部分补贴提供了理由。【原文：President Donald Trump claims that rapid adoption of solar and wind power has made U.S. electricity unstable and expensive, justifying his bid to end most subsidies for renewable energy.】

item.title: 前高盛合伙人的投资公司发放 10 亿美元住宅建筑商贷款
item.description: 由高盛（Goldman Sachs）校友唐-马伦（Don Mullen）创办的专注于房地产的投资公司 Pretium 周四表示，在过去六个月中，该公司已向住宅建筑商发放了超过 10 亿美元的贷款。【原文：Pretium, a real-estate focused investment firm founded by Goldman Sachs alum Don Mullen, said on Thursday it has originated more than $1 billion in loans to homebuilders in the last six months.】

item.title: 欧盟最高法庭顾问在 Meta Platforms 纠纷中站在意大利一边
item.description: 欧盟最高法院的一位顾问周四表示，只要不损害合同自由，欧盟成员国有权自行采取措施，加强出版商在与大型网络平台打交道时的地位。【原文：EU member states have the right to impose their own measures to strengthen the position of publishers in their dealings with large online platforms as long as these do not undermine freedom of contract, an adviser to the EU's highest court said on Thursday.】

item.title: 加拿大寻求与东南亚国家签订协议以实现贸易多样化
item.description: 加拿大最高外交官表示，加拿大正在寻求与东南亚国家敲定一项自由贸易协定，作为其拓展新市场的努力的一部分，以回应其邻国和最大贸易伙伴美国对其征收的高额关税。【原文：Canada is seeking to finalise a free trade deal with Southeast Asian nations as part of a push to expand into new markets, its top diplomat said, responding to the hefty tariffs imposed on it by the United States, its neighbour and largest trade partner.】

item.title: 意大利因涉嫌投资服务中的不公平行为对 Revolut 进行调查
item.description: 意大利竞争管理机构（AGCM）周四表示，已对英国金融科技巨头 Revolut 的一些部门展开调查，指控其在投资和银行服务方面存在不公平的商业行为。【原文：Italy's competition authority (AGCM) has opened a probe into some units of British financial technology giant Revolut for alleged unfair commercial practices related to its investment and banking services, the watchdog said on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，巴基斯坦希望罗斯福酒店重建计划估值达到 10 亿美元
item.description: 一位高级政府官员表示，巴基斯坦正在为其在纽约拥有的罗斯福酒店寻求至少 10 亿美元的估值，并准备在寻找重建合作伙伴的过程中放弃在曼哈顿黄金地段的少数股份。【原文：Pakistan is seeking a valuation of at least $1 billion for the Roosevelt Hotel it owns in New York and is ready to part with a minority stake in the prime Manhattan property as it scouts for a redevelopment partner, a senior government official said.】

item.title: 迪拜将首次推出由人工智能厨师经营的餐厅
item.description: 在迪拜，您的晚餐可能很快会配上源代码。【原文：In Dubai, your dinner might soon come with a side of source code.】
